title: Introducing: Theme Park
content:
Artwork by Kate Graham

In a world saturated by lo-fi drone and bratty LA hip-hop it’s a rare thing these days to come across music that can be simply described as ‘fun’. That’s not to belittle Theme Park, their jerky 80’s inspired debut tunes sport a rather intricate little sonic arrangement. But more than anything their music acts as an antidote; catchy hooks, joyous synths combined with youthful and delirious vocals are the order of the day. It could be just enough to take your attention away from GOBLIN (it leaked by the way).
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
